Test case harness

This is a simple test harness that just includes Ext JS bootstrap and an empty script tag for you to insert test case code.

Use this harness to verify that a test case produces a bug but please do not commit any changes to this file. Instead, follow this process

  1. Create a ticket with the issue in Jira
  2. Create a new .html file in this test/issues folder named after the Jira ticket number (e.g. Jira issue 1234 would be 1234.html)
  3. Copy/paste the contents of template.html into your new 1234.html, then copy the test case itself into the empty <script> tag
  4. Push the new file into git and create a pull request to the current patch branch
